author: felicity
msg: bug 1782: a potential but in stdio could cause journal data to be
corrupted by multiple writes to the same area of the journal.  switch to
using syswrite() instead of just print (stdio) to help address this issue.

author: jmason
msg: bug 1860: Bayes was not using hapaxes

author: duncf
msg: Fix to check ROT13 encoding of e-mail address that don't end in .com
.net .org or .ca. (Seeing how we're internation and all... obviously)

author: felicity
msg: bug 1589: spammers have been targeting our nice rules to get themselves
negative overall scores.  ran the GA again to lower the nice rule scores.
this should help deal with the forgeries.  also added a "TOO_MANY_MUA"
rule that will catch when multiple USER_AGENT rules hit.

author: felicity
msg: don't use a system call when we can just run mkdir
allow learn rules to get larger scores
